com.epoch.db

Class QuestionRW

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.db.DBCommon
      • com.epoch.db.QuestionRW
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorConstants, QuestionConstants, XMLConstants

    public final class QuestionRW
extends DBCommon
implements AuthorConstants, QuestionConstants
    Contains all static methods pertaining to reading and writing questions.

      • getQuestions

        public static List<Question> getQuestions(int qSetId,
                                          String instructorId)
                                   throws DBException
        Gets the locally or master-authored questions in a question set sorted by master/local first, serial number second, and qId third. Locally authored Qs have negative qId, so they need to be sorted greater to lesser. Called by QSet and above.
        Parameters:
        qSetId - unique ID of the question set
        instructorId - instructor's login ID
        Returns:
        questions sorted by unique ID
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • sqlIgnoreCase

        private static String sqlIgnoreCase(String str)
        Converts a string into a regular expression that is case- and whitespace-agnostic.
        Parameters:
        str - a string
        Returns:
        the string with every letter X or x changed to [Xx] and with contiguous whitespace characters changed to \\s+.

      • getQuestionsMap

        static Map<Integer,Question> getQuestionsMap(Connection con,
                                             SQLWithQMarks qIdSelector,
                                             DBTables tables,
                                             String instructorId,
                                             boolean addHeader)
                                      throws DBException
        Gets a map of questions keyed by their ID numbers. Called by HWRead.
        Parameters:
        con - connection to database
        qIdSelector - SQL containing question marks representing unique IDs of desired questions, appended with SQL for instructor's userId if they are local, plus values to substitute for the question marks
        tables - tables for master- or locally authored questions
        instructorId - instructor's login ID
        addHeader - whether to add the common question statement to this question's statement
        Returns:
        questions keyed by IDs
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

                                             SQLWithQMarks qIdSelector,

                                             String instructorId,
                                             boolean fullLoad,
                                             boolean addHeader)
                                      throws DBException
        Gets a map of questions keyed by their ID numbers. Called by HWRead.

        con - connection to database
        qIdSelector - SQL containing question marks representing unique IDs of desired questions, appended with SQL for instructor's userId if they are local, plus values to substitute for the question marks
        tables - tables for master- or locally authored questions
        instructorId - instructor's login ID
        fullLoad - full or light (flags, question data only)
        addHeader - whether to add common question statements to these questions' statements
        Returns:
        questions keyed by IDs
        Throws:

      • deleteQuestion

        public static void deleteQuestion(int qId)
                           throws DBException
        Delete a question from the master table. ACE allows users to delete questions only when they are NOT part of a random group of questions in an assignment.
        Parameters:
        qId - unique ID of question to be deleted
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • deleteQuestion

        public static void deleteQuestion(int qId,
                                  String authorId)
                           throws DBException
        Delete a question from the master table or a user's private table. ACE allows users to delete questions only when they are NOT part of a random group of questions in an assignment.
        Parameters:
        qId - unique ID of question to be deleted
        authorId - login ID of the question author (null if master)
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • deleteQuestions

        static void deleteQuestions(Connection con,
                            String[] authorIds)
                     throws DBException
        Delete all of a user's locally authored questions. Called by UserWrite. We don't need to delete responses to these questions here because all of this user's courses and assignments will be deleted as well.
        Parameters:
        con - connection to database
        authorIds - author IDs
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • setQSerialNos

        public static void setQSerialNos(int[] qIds,
                                 String authorId)
                          throws DBException
        Sets serial numbers of questions in a set. Called by QSet.
        Parameters:
        qIds - unique ID numbers of questions in order of their serial numbers
        authorId - login ID of the question author (null if master)
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • moveQtoNewQset

        public static void moveQtoNewQset(int[] qIds,
                                  int qSetId,
                                  boolean qIsLocal)
                           throws DBException
        Moves a question to a different question set. Called from QSet. Local instructor can evoke this method only for Qs that that instructor has written.
        Parameters:
        qIds - unique ID numbers of questions to be moved
        qSetId - unique ID of question set to which to move questions
        qIsLocal - whether questions are locally authored
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • getConvertibleEvalText

        public static Map<String,String> getConvertibleEvalText(boolean local)
                                                 throws DBException
        Gets all evaluator text data where inputToCERs(data) != data.
        Parameters:
        local - whether to edit local author table
        Returns:
        Map of evaluator text data by qId, majorId, minorId
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • putEvalText

        public static void putEvalText(String key,
                               String text,
                               boolean local)
                        throws DBException
        Replaces an existing evaluator text data with a new one. Used to convert UTF-8 text into ASCII with character entity representations.
        Parameters:
        key - the qID and eval IDs of the data
        text - the new data
        local - whether to edit local author tables
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • getConvertibleFeedback

        public static Map<String,String> getConvertibleFeedback(boolean local)
                                                 throws DBException
        Gets all feedback where inputToCERs(feedback) != feedback.
        Parameters:
        local - whether to edit local author table
        Returns:
        Map of feedback by qId, majorId, minorId
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • putFeedback

                               String feedback,
                               boolean local)
                        throws DBException
        Replaces an existing feedback with a new one. Used to convert UTF-8 text into ASCII with character entity representations.
        Parameters:
        key - the qID and eval IDs of the feedback
        feedback - the new feedback
        local - whether to edit local author table
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • getConvertibleQData

        public static Map<String,String> getConvertibleQData(boolean local)
                                              throws DBException
        Gets all qData where inputToCERs(qData) != qData.
        Parameters:
        local - whether to edit local author table
        Returns:
        Map of qData by unique ID
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • putQData

        public static void putQData(String qDataId,
                            String qData,
                            boolean local)
                     throws DBException
        Replaces an existing qDatum with a new one. Used to convert UTF-8 text into ASCII with character entity representations.
        Parameters:
        qDataId - the unique ID of the qData
        qData - the new qDatum
        local - whether to edit local author table
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • getConvertibleStatements

        public static Map<String,String> getConvertibleStatements(boolean local)
                                                   throws DBException
        Gets all statements where inputToCERs(statement) != statement.
        Parameters:
        local - whether to edit local author table
        Returns:
        Map of statement by qId
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database
